post: 📜  #OTD 1809: Abraham Lincoln is born. 4 years after the Battle of Gettysburg, his government of the people…  line still challenges every generation. Use this mini-doc as a fast class hook, what does that phrase require of citizens?  https://bit.ly/405NinJ  #TDiH  #Lincoln  #AmericanHistory  #CivicEducation

Should social platforms require users to be 16+? Have students weigh safety, privacy, and digital rights, then submit a Yes/No/In-between answer by Feb 26.  https://bit.ly/405lfF0  #ThinkTheVote  #CivicEducation  #CivilDiscourse  #DigitalCitizenship

Teachers: your best A250 lesson deserves daylight. Share a 50-word classroom moment and youre in the weekly Civic Star Challenge prize drawing for up to $10,000. Submit here:  https://bit.ly/463KXxf  #CivicStarChallenge  #America250  #CivicEducation  #Teachers

Teacher move: run a 1-class impact kickoff:  Need ➡️ Action ➡️ Result. If students can map it, they can build it. Students 13-19 can submit by May 3 for up to $10,000. What issue would your class pick?  https://bit.ly/3EVuQY2  #MyImpactChallenge  #ProjectBasedLearning  #CivicEducation  #YouthLeadership

Confidence isnt a personality trait, its reps. DMTA gives students structured practice: claim ➡️ evidence ➡️ reasoning ➡️ rebuttal. Start with the U. S. Virtual Qualifier. 🔗  https://lnkd.in/epxBrefs  #DebatingMatters  #DMTA  #YouthLeadership  #Debate

Thank you, Master Printing + Mailing, for donating 250,000 Pocket Constitutions to classrooms nationwide via Power of the Printed Word. Your generous gift is much appreciated by Americas students! Tag a print-industry peer who should join next! 🔗  https://bit.ly/4aqFf9S Also grateful for partners supporting distribution: Case Paper, Konica Minolta Business Solutions U. S. A., Inc., History By Mail, TECNAU, Canon USA, and Heidelberger Druckmaschinen AG If your company prints, mails, or supplies paper/equipment, and wants to put primary sources in students hands, lets talk.  #PowerOfThePrintedWord  #CivicEducation  #America250  #Civics

We are proud to support the Bill of Rights Institute's Power of the Printed Word Initiative by donating the printing and distribution of "250 for 250." That's 250,000 pocket constitutions supporting 2,500 government, history and civics classrooms across the country! The Constitution and Bill of Rights remain the framework and firm foundation of the American experiment. If you are interested in learning more, please visit the Bill of Rights Institute at www.mybri.org  #constitution  #billofrights  #civics  #history  #government  #poweroftheprintedword  #printing  #marketing  #digitalmarketing  #printwithmaster

Black History Month: During the Revolution, James Armistead Lafayette gathered intelligence inside Cornwalliss camp, helping pave the way to Yorktown. Featuring BRIs Kirk Higgins. Listen, then share. Whos an unsung patriot  you teach?  https://ihr.fm/3Zrk42s  #BlackHistoryMonth  #AmericanRevolution  #CivicEducation  #Podcast

Easy classroom win: use the National Civics Bee essay as your next writing task (issue → solution → principles/virtues). BRI wrote the prompt + questions. Deadline Feb 17. Share with students you know:  https://lnkd.in/esNd4QDK  #NationalCivicsBee  #Teachers  #CivicEducation  #Writing

Midyear reset: pick one lesson youre already teaching and add a quick connection to the Declaration, then log it. The Civic Star Challenge is built for busy classrooms (fast entry, real recognition). Comment with your February unit and well reply with a simple civics tie-in idea. 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #Teaching  #CivicEducation  #K12
